snippet: KANTOR--Adrienne. Marion and Samuel Waxman, M.D., the Samuel Waxman Cancer Research Foundation Board and Staff extend their deepest sympathies to Robert Kantor, his daughter Mary Lauren Kantor and his mother Mary Kantor. Adrienne was a longtime supporter and champion of SWCRF's mission. She is irreplaceable, unparalleled and we will miss her dearly. To know a person like Adrienne is a privilege, we feel both lucky and honored to have called her our friend. Michael Nierenberg Chairman, Board of Directors Samuel Waxman, M.D. Founder and CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: KANTOR--Adrienne. Marion and Samuel Waxman, M.D., the Samuel Waxman Cancer Research Foundation Board and Staff extend their deepest sympathies to Robert Kantor, his daughter Mary Lauren Kantor and his mother Mary Kantor. Adrienne was a longtime supporter and champion of SWCRF's mission. She is irreplaceable, unparalleled and we will miss her dearly. To know a person like Adrienne is a privilege, we feel both lucky and honored to have called her our friend. Michael Nierenberg Chairman, Board of Directors Samuel Waxman, M.D. Founder and CEO 1/3
